.init

.route


			App.route("/", {

				templateUrl: "views/home.html",
				controller: "HomeCtrl"

			});

.controller


			App.controller("link", function(scope, el, value) {

				$(el).on("click", function() {
					window.location.href = value;
				});	

			});
